text: This article lists notable musicians who have played the trumpet, cornet or flugelhorn. ==Classical players== * Bill Adam * Maurice André * Ryan Anthony * Jean Baptiste Arban * Sir Malcolm Arnold * Alison Balsom * Marco Blaauw * James F.
